titles: The history of the execrable Irish rebellion trac'd from many preceding acts to the grand eruption the 23 of October, 1641, and thence pursued to the Act of Settlement, MDCLXII.
author: Borlase, Edmund, d. 1682?
notes: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Boslase.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
